mapper.select:
select calendar_no,userno, calendar_title, content, start1, end1 from calendar
and userno = #{userno}
mapper.insert:
select CAL_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into calendar (calendar_no, userno, calendar_title, content, start1, end1) VALUES (#{calendarNo}, #{userno}, #{calendarTitle}, #{content}, #{start1}, #{end1})
